recipesJson.name: Cereally Easy Pebbles
recipesJson.author: KRUCIAL
recipesJson.description: The description is in the name and its a delicious representation of the profile. I threw this together for friend of mine and he loved it. So I decided I needed to share it with the world. So let me know what you think. Mix it, enjoy it, rate it, and comment.

reviews.text: I've mixed up alot of Pebblez from ATF and ELR that had alot more ingredients but I can't say they produced a better vape.  Simple is an approach i wished more people embraced.  I don't care how good your taste buds are.  No one is tasting all the individual components of a 10 ingredient recipe.  And since I have a hard time finding flavors in my inventory, its nice to pull out 3 bottles and be done.  My wife appreciates not having to help me find "cream fresh". Oh yeah its real good off the shake.
There should be more recipe's like this out there!! Simple to make and delicious to vape. Thanks for sharing

I Love simple stuff!!! And for a Simple cereal, its awesome!! 
It is a bit short on the crunchy sugary complexity, but hey Its called Cereally EASY pebbles, so for what it is, its awesome, thanks and well done
Thanks for the recipe.  I bought Fruity Flakes probably 6 months ago, and forgot about it.  As a S&V, taste fairly good.  Will let it sit a week and see what Cream Milky Undertone steeps into.
Simple recipe that I really enjoy!  I gave it a week and then I couldn't stop vaping it.
